Text.val: Author: Juergen Paarmann
02.10.2014 SH SCR19021 Added range CLNT806_DOCUMENT = N in Part 2
18.08.2014 SH SCR19021 Removed deletion MQ61 and added range CLNT806_DOCUMENT = N
14.03.2014 JH SCR18773 Added selection on MQDT in Check maximum stock finance
12.03.2014 GB SCR18773 Extended selection of CLIENT rows
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
16.11.2007 AK SCR13019 deleted MQ's (61) with BMQ015
04.01.2006 BT SCR10009 added new field table CSTO
13.06.2005 AK SCR8570 added : Check maximum stock finance
09.01.2004 JJ SCR5211 added 0 argument for new parameter BSP006

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT415_STOCKLISTFREQUENCY, CLNT415_CREDITORLISTFREQUENCY, CLNT415_REDUCESTOCK, s.CSTO_STOCKLISTDATE , s.CSTO_CREDITORSLISTDATE, s.CSTO_NETSTOCKFACILITY, MAXDATE from :1/clnt , :1/csto s , (select su.CSTO_ADMNO, su.CSTO_CLNTNO, MAX(su.CSTO_DATE) MAXDATE from :1/csto su group by su.CSTO_ADMNO, su.CSTO_CLNTNO ) sq where CLNT415_STOCKFINANCE='Y' and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT=1 and CLNT806_DOCUMENT='N' and ( CLNT415_STOCKLISTFREQUENCY>0 or CLNT415_CREDITORLISTFREQUENCY>0 ) and s.CSTO_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and s.CSTO_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO and sq.CSTO_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and sq.CSTO_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO and s.CSTO_DATE=MAXDATE and not(exists(select * from :1/mqdt where MQDT_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and MQDT_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO and MQDT_MQTY_ID=299))

Text.val: //output parameter from BSP005
//client rows where StockListDelay or CreditorListDelay = True
//inform department about delay if CLNT415_REDUCESTOCK = 'N'
//reduce stock finance

//new CSTO row
//values from existing row
//call BSP006 to book the changes with old CSTO_NETSTOCKFACILITY from sql
//Only if now new record exists
// update CSTO with output from BSP005
Using SQL where, (press Ctrl+H)
calculate the new stock availability
only if there's a different
//new CSTO row
//values from existing row (link on index 1 dec -to find the last client record)
//call BSP006 to book the changes with old CSTO_NETSTOCKFACILITY from sql
//Only if now new record exists
// update CSTO with output from BSP005
